# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-arm64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/pygments/filters/__init__.py
@source-hash: 87f928624505a3e1
@generated: 2026-02-09T17:57:56Z

## Purpose
Core filter module for Pygments lexer token stream processing. Provides filter lookup infrastructure and 8 built-in filters for token manipulation, symbol conversion, and visual formatting. Part of the pip-vendored Pygments package for syntax highlighting.

## Key Functions

**find_filter_class(filtername)** (L22-29)
- Looks up filter classes by name from FILTERS dict or plugin system
- Returns None if not found
- Checks built-in FILTERS first, then searches plugins via find_plugin_filters()

**get_filter_by_name(filtername, **options)** (L32-42)  
- Returns instantiated filter with options
- Raises ClassNotFound if filter not found
- Main factory function for creating filter instances

**get_all_filters()** (L45-49)
- Generator yielding all available filter names
- Combines built-in and plugin filter names

**_replace_special(ttype, value, regex, specialttype, replacefunc)** (L52-62)
- Utility for regex-based token replacement within values
- Preserves original token type for non-matching parts
- Used by multiple filter classes for pattern-based transformations

## Filter Classes

**CodeTagFilter** (L65-95)
- Highlights code tags (TODO, FIXME, XXX, BUG, NOTE) in comments/docstrings
- Configurable tag list via 'codetags' option
- Uses Comment.Special token type for highlighting
- Processes String.Doc and Comment tokens (excluding Comment.Preproc)

**SymbolFilter** (L97-685)
- Converts LaTeX/Isabelle mathematical symbols to Unicode
- Large symbol dictionaries: latex_symbols (L111-308), isabelle_symbols (L310-669)
- Configurable language via 'lang' option (default: 'isabelle')
- Direct symbol-to-Unicode mapping without regex processing

**KeywordCaseFilter** (L687-713)
- Transforms keyword casing: lowercase, uppercase, capitalize
- Uses str methods dynamically via getattr()
- Processes all Keyword token types

**NameHighlightFilter** (L715-754)
- Retypes specific name tokens to different token types
- Configurable names list and target token type
- Default target: Name.Function
- Processes all Name.* tokens

**RaiseOnErrorTokenFilter** (L760-787)
- Raises exceptions when Error tokens are encountered
- Configurable exception class (default: ErrorToken)
- Validates exception class inheritance at initialization

**VisibleWhitespaceFilter** (L789-866)
- Converts whitespace to visible Unicode characters
- Configurable replacements for spaces (·), tabs (»), newlines (¶)
- Optional Whitespace token type assignment
- Handles tab expansion with configurable tabsize

**GobbleFilter** (L868-905)
- Removes fixed number of characters from line beginnings
- Handles multi-line tokens correctly
- Tracks remaining characters to gobble across token boundaries

**TokenMergeFilter** (L907-929)
- Merges consecutive tokens of same type
- Simple stateful processing for token consolidation

## Global Registry

**FILTERS** (L931-940)
- Dictionary mapping filter names to filter classes
- Used by find_filter_class() for lookup
- 8 built-in filters: codetagify, keywordcase, highlight, raiseonerror, whitespace, gobble, tokenmerge, symbols

## Dependencies
- Standard library: re
- Pygments internals: token types, Filter base class, utility functions, plugin system
- All classes inherit from pip._vendor.pygments.filter.Filter
